subtitle: A delicious meal with bread and butter or serve with salad for a main meal.

method.text: Pull away the claws from the body of the crab - twist them towards you to make this easy. Take away the body from the main shell. Remove the stomach bag and discard.

Remove the dark flesh from the large shell with a small spoon. Put it into a basin. Crack the rounded part of the shell. Remove the white flesh. Put this into a separate basin. Discard any grey fingers from the body.
Crack the large claws and remove the white flesh. Clean the crab shells in cold water then polish with a few drops of oil.
Mix the white flesh with a teaspoon of the lemon juice. Season to taste. Mix the dark flesh with the remaining lemon juice, breadcrumbs and seasoning.
Finely chop the white of the hard-boiled egg. Press the egg yolks through a fine sieve. Arrange the white meat in each end of the shells and the dark meat down the centre.
Hold a blunt knife between the white and brown crab meat. Carefully spoon lines of parsley, chopped egg white and sieved egg yolk down the crab.

title: Dressed crab
